job.title: Machine Learning Engineer (Remote)
job.description: stronguCompany DescriptionbrbrustrongstrongOur MissionbrbrstrongAt Palo Alto Networks everything starts and ends with our missionbrbrBeing the cybersecurity partner of choice protecting our digital way of lifebrbrWe have the vision of a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before These arent easy goals to accomplish  but were not here for easy Were here for better We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done and were looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we arebrbrDisruption is at the core of our technology and on our way of work to meet the needs of our employees now and in the future through FLEXWORK our approach to how we work Were changing the nature of work from benefits to learning location to leadership weve rethought and recreated every aspect of the employee experience at Palo Alto Networks And because it FLEXes around each individual employee based on their individual choices employees are empowered to push boundaries and help us all evolve togetherbrbrThe Global Customer Services GCS team is a six time TSIA Rated Outstanding Global and JD Power Certified Assisted Technical Support Global organizationbrbrWe are looking to transform every situation into an enriching digital experience one interaction at a time so that employees partners and customers can strive towards their desired outcomes Your ultimate goal will be to shape and build efficient selflearning applications and to leverage what we currently have in place to help us succeed in being the best at what we dobrbrstronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongstrongYour ImpactbrbrstrongThe Machine Learning ML Engineer will help to create artificially intelligent opportunities for our customers to be successful across our entire digital ecosystembrbrstronguResponsibilities IncludebrustrongulliKnowledge of Python JS CSS and HTMLliliDesigning and developing machine learning and deep learning systemsliliImplementing appropriate ML algorithmsliliLeveraging our current ML capabilitiesliliStudy and transform data science prototypesliliResearch and implement appropriate ML algorithms and toolsliliSelect appropriate datasets and data representation methodsliliRun machine learning tests and experimentsliliPerform statistical analysis and finetuning using test resultsliliExtend existing ML libraries and frameworksliliExperience building NLP applications for contextualizing databrliulstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongstrongYour ExperiencebrstrongulliBS in Computer Science Mathematics or Technology Masters degree is a pluslili5 years as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar roleliliUnderstanding of data structures data modeling and software architectureliliDeep knowledge of math probability statistics and algorithmsliliAbility to write robust code in Python Java and RliliFamiliarity with machine learning frameworks like Keras or PyTorch and libraries like scikitlearnliliBelieve in teamwork and collaborationliliAnswer product configuration questionsbrliulstronguAdditional InformationbrbrustrongstrongOur CommitmentbrbrstrongWere trailblazers that dream big take risks and challenge cybersecuritys status quo Its simple we cant accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating togetherbrbrWe are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for all qualified individuals with a disability If you require assistance or accommodation due to a disability or special need please contact us at accommodationspaloaltonetworkscombrbrPalo Alto Networks is an equal opportunity employer We celebrate diversity in our workplace and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age ancestry color family or medical care leave gender identity or expression genetic information marital status medical condition national origin physical or mental disability political affiliation protected veteran status race religion sex including pregnancy sexual orientation or other legally protected characteristicsbrbrAll your information will be kept confidential
